translation.nerd: Photo appraisal: You can not appraise the photo
translation.ru: Вы не можете оценить эту работу

translation.nerd: Photo appraisal: Appraise the photo with custom marks
translation.ru: Оценить работу согласно оценок в форме голосования

translation.nerd: Photo appraisal: Appraise the photo with maximum accessible for you marks ( +$1 )
Photo appraisal: Your appraisal has been saved successfully
Photo appraisal: You are not the user who has loaded appraisal form. The user must have changed since then.
Photo appraisal: Select at least one pair of appraisal category and mark
translation.ru: Выберите как минимум одну категорию голосования и установите вашу оценку
